Our RPC partner @POKTnetwork has bounties for you! 🤩 Help them with our @EthereumDenver event and win $wPOKT prizes worth $2000 in total 🏆 💰💰💰💰💰
Pocket Network: It's bounty time! We're getting ready for Denver and we want your help to create the best possible event. Meet other builders, take a break from hacking and hustling, and have some fun with lego. Signups are already at 200 + we're still a month away. The crowd is looking very…

entry.summary:
Don't forget... We'll be discussing plans for our @EthereumDenver today @ 5pm UTC in discord. Talk topics, web3 themed lego plans and alpha on bounty competitions being announced later today 🤫 @adrienne_adz from the @POKTnetwork team will be joining us.
Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀): Who's excited for @EthereumDenver ? We're hyped to host another mixer with @POKTnetwork (and friends!) This time with a LEGO theme 😃 Join us in discord @ 5pm UTC on Wednesday to riff on topics and custom LEGO builds to make this more bullish than 🦃 https://buff.ly/3HpHV9T
